0000001101010001 1110000000110000 0 -> sum: 1110001110000001, cout: 0

1001000011010011 1010011000101011 1 -> sum: 0011011011111111, cout: 1

1111000101001010 1100101010111010 0 -> sum: 1011110000000100, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
